Articles.Content:
I downloaded the newest version of KSP from Steam after playing the demo forever.

I have googled and tried deleting my ksp settings, adjusting all kinds of graphics settings, and I still am stumped.

I am playing career mode.

My parachutes, pods, rockets, etc., are all white with no textures. Only the flea rocket, buildings, kerbals, and terrain are normal textures. I have not tried any mods or altered anything.

I tried verifying files through steam as well. Where am I going wrong?

Hi cathairez, it sounds like the textures failed to download, if you delete the gamedata folder and verify with Steam again, it'll download them anew.

If that fails to fix this we'll need to see the KSP.log from the main folder and possibly the output\_log from the KSPData folder as well, you can upload them to dropbox ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
